attributes.action: Stop LTN's in L.B of Sutton
attributes.additional_details: Government MUST intervene and ensure local government and councillors follow a full and open consultation with residents of the areas and towns affected and prevent implementation until this can be done as a democratic process. In the London Borough of Sutton these LTN's are being forced through without the full support of residents and the electorate damaging local relationships during a challenging pandemic and ruining local business and not supporting an 'open Britain'.
attributes.background: Currently under COVID emergency measures, LTN's are being forced through by local governments without any democratic consultation of the electorate. They need to be stopped immediately unless full consultation is held prior to implementation and revoked until such time meetings can be held.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local borough.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552306
